name: Ungrounded: Ripple Unleashed VR
description: Unleash your inner hero in this 16 player PvP VR arena. Fly and engage in high action aerial battles with energy blasts and charge beams. Grapple across buildings facing off against giant Titans with your two swords, or play as a Titan and crush the tiny humans going after you in this.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 or equivalent Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 or equivalent Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent Storage: 487 MB available space
